com.stephanlajaunie.projects.messaging.dao

Class AccountDAOs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephanlajaunie.projects.messaging.dao.AccountDAOs
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileDAO

    public class AccountDAOs
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates several methods utilized by specific edu.uw.ext.framework.account.AccountDao implementations and required by the AccountDao interface, specifically for operations handling deleting a file or entire directory. Getters and Setters for persisted Accounts are handled by specific implementations of AccountDao
    Author:
    slajaunie

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccountDAOs()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearDirectory()
      Removes all accounts in the target/accounts directory.
      void deleteAccount(java.lang.String accountName)
      Removes the given account from the data source
      java.io.File getParentDirectory()
      Returns the parent directory used by the specific AccountDao implementation.
      void setParentDirectory(java.io.File parentDirectory)
      Sets the new parent directory used by the specific AccountDao implementation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountDAOs

        public AccountDAOs()

    • Method Detail

      • deleteAccount

        public void deleteAccount(java.lang.String accountName)
        Removes the given account from the data source
        Parameters:
        accountName - a String representing the name of the Account to be deleted
        Throws:
        AccountException - if an Account with the given name does not exist, or if the operation otherwise fails
        See Also:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.AccountDao#deleteAccount(java.lang.String)

      • clearDirectory

        public void clearDirectory()
        Removes all accounts in the target/accounts directory.
        Throws:
        AccountException - if the operation fails
        See Also:
        edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.AccountDao#reset()

      • getParentDirectory

        public java.io.File getParentDirectory()
        Returns the parent directory used by the specific AccountDao implementation. Property is a relative directory of "target/accounts" by default
        Returns:
        a File encapsulating the parent directory used by the specific AccountDao implementation

      • setParentDirectory

        public void setParentDirectory(java.io.File parentDirectory)
        Sets the new parent directory used by the specific AccountDao implementation. Note that to avoid unintentional loss of data this method does nothing to delete or clear the contents of the prior parent directory
        Parameters:
        parentDirectory - the parent directory to be used by the specific AccountDao implementation
